concept.title: Prerequisites
concept.shortdesc: Before you run a pipeline with the CoAP Server origin, configure the CoAP clients to send data to the CoAP Server listening port and resource.

conbody.p: CoAP Server originprerequisitesprerequisitesCoAP Server originWhen you configure the CoAP Server origin, you define a listening port number where the origin listens for data. You also define the resource name used to pass requests to the origin. To pass data to the pipeline, configure each CoAP client to send data to a URL that includes the listening port number and resource name.
Use the following format for the URL:coap://<sdc_hostname>:<listening_port>/<resource_name>
The URL includes the following components:

ul.li: <listening_port> - The port number where the origin listens for data.
<resource_name> - The resource name used to pass requests to the origin.
